example.eg: This house is in terrible condition.  It needs a lot of work.
example.egtrans: 这栋房子的状况很差，需要大修。

example.eg: Philosophers consider the human condition.
example.egtrans: 哲学家思考人类的处境。

example.eg: The cancer patient is in stable condition.
I will do it - on one condition.
example.egtrans: 我会做的——不过有一个前提条件。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 前提条件, 必要条件

example.eg: He has a heart condition.
Fishermen work in difficult conditions.
example.egtrans: 渔夫们在恶劣的条件下劳作。

example.eg: Politicians are conditioning the people to accept the policy.
example.egtrans: 政客们在让人们做好心理准备，好接受这一政策。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使适应, 使有准备, 使习惯于

example.eg: He is conditioning his body for the race.
example.egtrans: 他正在进行调整，使自己的身体适应比赛。

example.eg: I always condition my hair after washing.
example.egtrans: 我在洗头后总会给头发涂护发素。

example.eg: I wish they would air-condition this hot room.
The doctor says that they have medicines to treat chronic conditions.
Doctors said he was in a critical condition, due to serious injuries.
Life and death are the opposite ends of the human condition.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 人的生活, 人的境况

example.eg: You have to be in good condition to run a marathon.
The camera she bought second-hand on the internet was in good condition.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 完好无损的，情况良好的

example.eg: My grandmother's typewriter is still in good working condition.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 状况良好, 处于良好工作状态

example.eg: I only buy things second-hand if they're in mint condition.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 看上去跟新的一样, 崭新的

example.eg: When buying second-hand albums, the record shop only accepts mint condition.
The presence of oxygen is a necessary condition to support human life.
I'll lend you £500, on condition that you pay me back by Monday.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 假设…, 如果…, 在…条件下

example.eg: You can buy this house on the condition that you sell yours first.
After the quarry was filled in, the developers had promised to restore the land to its original condition.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 初始状态, 原始状态

example.eg: The book had never been removed from the shrink wrapping, and was in original condition.
Triathletes have to be in peak physical condition.
The gunshot victim is in a stable condition at County Hospital.
